name: DashBit
description:
DashBit Is short hard minimalistic 1bit platformer with main focus on dashing mechanic. 

CONTROLS

WSAD - move and jump

SPACE - dash

you can remap keys in the options now

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'M CURRENTLY WORKING ON MORE LEVELS AND FEW QOL CHANGES

I made it as my first project in Godot game engine, with scope to learn as much as i can. Leave your opinion in comments bellow, feedback would be appreciated, and remember to Follow me if you liked the game and would like to see more :D

Credits

Art - PixelHole's 8x8 1bit dungeon Tileset

Font - Awkward by Void under CC BY 4.0

I have also used and tweaked character controler from HearthBeast's Godot platformer tutorial
